description: Breastfeeding helps mother and baby form a close, loving relationship.
title: Breastfeeding helps mother and baby form a close, loving relationship
content:
- Newborn babies should be given to the mother to hold immediately
   after delivery.

 - Newborn babies should have skin-to-skin contact with the mother
   during breastfeeding.

 - The close contact and attention from the mother helps baby feel
   secure and loved; important for their growth and development.

 - The father and other family members should encourage mother to rest
   quietly while she breastfeeds the baby.
